snippet: Both teams’ chances of advancing on the road in the Football Championship Series rest heavily on the arms of Wagner’s Nick Doscher and Stony Brook’s Kyle Essington.
abstract: Stony Brook and Wagner College football teams will rely heavily on their senior quarterbacks, Kyle Essington and Nick Doscher, as they seek to move forward in the Football Championship Series.
lead_paragraph: Both teams’ chances of advancing on the road in the Football Championship Series rest heavily on the arms of Wagner’s Nick Doscher and Stony Brook’s Kyle Essington.

headline.seo: Wagner and Stony Brook Ride Hot Passers in Playoffs
headline.main: A Playoff Call to Arms for Two Quarterbacks
headline.print_headline: A Playoff Call to Arms For Two Quarterbacks

keywords.value: State University of New York at Stony Brook
keywords.name: organizations
